research_vectors.title: Adversarial Containment in Agentic Swarms
research_vectors.objective: Develop algorithms to detect and isolate rogue agents in decentralized networks before they breach CRA protocols.

research_vectors.title: Cryptographic Truth Anchoring
research_vectors.objective: Research into high-frequency Arweave serialization to prevent 'Hallucinated History' by large language models.

research_vectors.title: Sovereign Remittance Models
research_vectors.objective: Optimization of the 'Play-to-Pay' Triple-Lock engine to maximize gatekeeper revenue while maintaining contributor incentives.
